plugins.name: architect-planner
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive, implementation-ready end-to-end application plans for software projects across all major platforms. Supports Android, iOS, Flutter, React Native, Tauri, and Electron with automatic platform detection. Features TDD-based frontend and backend execution, modern UI validation, and platform-specific architecture patterns.
